module.name: Callback
module.changelog: *13.0.5.4* Fixing FREEPBX-17867 *13.0.5.3* FREEPBX-18100 Callback timeout and cid on GUI *13.0.5.2* FREEPBX-14739 Unable to select the "Destination after Callback" value under Callback application. *13.0.5.1* FREEPBX-14740 Multiple Callbacks can be added with same Name *13.0.5* Use '/usr/bin/env php' to start script *13.0.4* Invalid variable in destinations *13.0.3* Slideout menu, move grid to ajax handler *13.0.2* Version bump Beta *13.0.1alpha1* FREEPBX-9039 Remove Departments *2.11.0.4* #1953 *2.11.0.3* Generate license file *2.11.0.1* Add wrapper function for DB helper *2.11.0.0* #6051 *2.10.0.1* #5478 *2.10.0.0* new version changes *2.9.0.4* spellings, localizaions *2.9.0.3* #4840 *2.9.0.2* #4787 *2.9.0.1* set repo *2.9.0.0* #4639, #4655 *2.8.0.0* published 2.8 version *2.7.0.0* localizations *2.6.0.1* #3838 *2.6.0.0* localizations, misc *2.5.0.2* #3272 missing callback_check_destinations(), localization fixes *2.5.0.1* Swedish Translations, fix Italian Translations *2.5.0* #2845 tabindex *2.4.0.2* #2843 Russian Translation *2.4.0.1* add 2.4.0 dependency *2.4.0* extension/destination registry, it translations *1.4.2.3* changed categories *1.4.2.2* bump for rc1 *1.4.2.1* changed freePBX to FreePBX *1.4.2* merge findmefollow/core extension destinations if any *1.4.1* Moved callback agi script from core to module *1.4.0* SQLite3 support, fixes ticket:1793 (only for FreePBX 2.3) *1.3.1* Add he_IL translation *1.3* Fixed UI errors for new 2.2 look. *1.2* First 2.2 release
